content: संघातः {@--1@} Union, combination, an association. {@--2@} A multitude, an assemblage, a collection; उपायमंघात इव प्रवृद्धः <ls>R. 14. 11</ls>; जलसंघात इवासि विद्रुतः <ls>Ku. 4. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Killing, slaughter. {@--4@} Phlegm. {@--5@} Formation of compounds. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a division of bell. {@--7@} A particular mode of walking (in dramas.).
